projects.projectDescription: A fully-functioning fish pond suitable for koi to elevate the atmosphere of one's backyard.
Gain mastery of ornithology for use with vision-enhancing devices.
Going through where the wildfires have burnt down the forest and replanting the trees.
Road trip to visit all state parks in the United States.
Comprehensive trip to Alaska in late Summer to early Fall for the Alaska State Fair.
Research local food shelves and volunteer to help stock and facilitate community participation.
Develop stronger understanding of the Python programming language.
Discover noSQL database structures through the use of MongoDB
Research and implement React for front-end web development (e.g., learn a language that lets you play with HTML without actually touching HTML).
